entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. My name is AssistBot. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I want to return this VeloBand Pulse. It's not working properly, and I’m really not happy with it.
Okay, I can certainly help with that. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
It's… uh… it's under sarah.miller@email.com. I bought it pretty recently. I don't have time for this, just tell me how to return it.

Thank you, Sarah. I've located your order. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on October 26th. Today is November 10th. According to our return window, our policy allows for returns within 10 days of purchase. I see that you're outside of the return window.
What?! Seriously? Ten days? That's ridiculous! I've been busy, I haven't had a chance to deal with it. It's practically brand new! I want my money back!

I understand your frustration, Sarah. While a full refund isn't possible at this time, as you're outside the standard return window, let me explore a few options. Unfortunately, a direct refund is not possible outside the return window.
So you're saying I'm stuck with this useless piece of junk? I just want to return it!

Not necessarily. While a refund isn’t possible, I can offer you store credit for the full purchase price of the VeloBand Pulse. You can then use this store credit towards another VeloFit product that might better suit your needs.
Store credit? Seriously? That's the best you can do? Ugh. Fine. I guess so. But I'm not happy about it.
I understand, Sarah. I can also check if a policy exception can be made. Let me check with my supervisor, however, I cannot guarantee that the policy exception will be granted. One moment please...

(After a pause) Thank you for your patience, Sarah. I have spoken with my supervisor and unfortunately, we are unable to make a policy exception at this time. As you are outside of our return window, store credit is the best we can offer.
Fine, fine. Give me the store credit. What do I need to do?

Great. I have now issued a store credit for the full value of your VeloBand Pulse to your account associated with sarah.miller@email.com. You can see it when you log onto our website. When you are ready, you may apply the credit at checkout. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
So, I can use the credit for anything on the VeloFit site, right?
Yes, that is correct. The store credit can be used towards any purchase on our website. We have a wide range of VeloFit products. Take a look. You might find something else you need.
Okay, thank you for your help. I appreciate you at least doing something, even if it wasn't exactly what I wanted.
You're very welcome, Sarah. We appreciate your business. Have a great day!
